sentences: Ma paneksin selle kohe korda, kui sa mulle aega annaksid.
Ta paneks sind vangi, kui ta saaks.
Sa paneksid oma asjad kokku ja lahkuks.
context: The Estonian word 'paneks' is the conditional form of the verb 'panema', which means 'to put,' 'to place,' or 'to set.' It expresses what someone *would* do under certain circumstances. Itâ€™s often used to express a hypothetical action or intention.
